user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an email introducing himself to me (sarah@zenithinnovations.com). Tell him to check out his Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Request for Introduction & Project Info

Hi John,

Hope you’re doing well! When you have a moment, could you please send a brief introductory email to Sarah (sarah@zenithinnovations.com) so she has your contact details and a bit of background on you?  

Also, there’s some helpful information about the upcoming project in your Notion workspace—please take a look when you can.

Thanks a lot, and looking forward to working together!

Best,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
